overview: Projected on a framework of particles that is sometimes ordered and sometimes in flux, Ottar Ormstadâ€˜s constructed language poetry is exposed and read by the author while performing to Mashtalirs pulsating music. This work is a collaboration between composer Mashtalir, poet Ormstad and artist Vojjov. A constructed language mixed with pulsating music in an atmospheric scape gives a unique experience!
title: Long Rong Song
